article_title: U.S. Rep. John K. Delaney: We must help working disabled veterans get care they need
article_text:

og.description: By U.S. REP. JOHN K. DELANEY America’s disabled veterans answered our country’s call, and when their time in uniform is done, our country must stand with them. One of the key issues all veterans face is making the transition to a civilian career. An|
